channel.title: Other on Salesforce Tek Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Salesforce Tek Talks

item.title: My Blog Journey
item.description: 2 Years ago I decided to start a personal blog to write about tech subjects (mostly salesforce related), In this post, I will take you through the journey that lead to what my blog is today. The Beggining 2 Years ago, I wanted to begin blogging about Salesforce subjects. I had recently discovered Heroku and was already familiar with Django. So for me it was a no brainer, Start a blog, use Django, Heroku and Voila… Create content!
